name: ethcontract-contracts
description: Test contracts for ethcontract-rs runtime and proc macro.

scripts.build: rimraf build && truffle build && npm run networks:inject
scripts.prepublish: npm run build && git diff --exit-code HEAD
scripts.deploy: truffle migrate --reset --network rinkeby && npm run networks:extract

author: Nicholas Rodrigues Lordello <nlordell@gmail.com>
